statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Inventory;
SELECT id, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Store A' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE last_update > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_update DESC
SELECT name, location FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 20 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE name LIKE '%chair%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, item_name FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT supplier_name, order_date FROM Supplies ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY location;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Supplies WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_orders FROM Supplies GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 1 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY item_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT id, supplier_name, location FROM Supplies WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity >= 50 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM team_locations;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_lead FROM teams WHERE team_lead = 'Alice';
SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM team_locations JOIN inventory_items ON team_locations.location_id = inventory_items.location_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, location_name FROM teams JOIN team_locations ON teams.team_id = team_locations.team_id;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM teams WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, team_name FROM team_locations JOIN teams ON team_locations.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location_name FROM inventory_items JOIN team_locations ON inventory_items.location_id = team_locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM teams ORDER BY team_name DESC;

SELECT team_name, COUNT(*) as total_inventory FROM teams JOIN team_locations ON teams.team_id = team_locations.team_id JOIN inventory_items ON team_locations.location_id = inventory_items.location_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM locations;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products;
SELECT location_name, product_name, quantity FROM locations JOIN inventory ON locations.location_id = inventory.location_id;
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category='Electronics';

SELECT location_name, location_address, product_name, quantity FROM locations JOIN inventory ON locations.location_id = inventory.location_id JOIN products ON inventory.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position, location_name FROM employees LEFT JOIN locations ON employees.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT * FROM Locations
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Locations
SELECT location_id, location_name, address FROM Locations
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM Locations WHERE state='CA';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, location_name FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN Locations ON Suppliers.location_id = Locations.location_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
